DOC.brief_summary: New onset diabetes mellitus ( NODM ) post- transplantation decrease patient graft survival . Some immunosuppressive agent associate high incidence NODM . This study evaluate safety efficacy convert patient NODM tacrolimus cyclosporine micro-emulsion primary immunosuppressant kidney liver recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Converting Maintenance Kidney Liver Transplant Recipients With Abnormal Glucose Metabolism From Tacrolimus Cyclosporine Micro-emulsion
